section.heading: Purposes.
section.text: In enacting this chapter, the Council of the District of Columbia supports the following statutory purposes:

para.text: To protect low- and moderate-income tenants from the erosion of their income from increased housing costs;
To provide incentives for the construction of new rental units and the rehabilitation of vacant rental units in the District;
To continue to improve the administrative machinery for the resolution of disputes and controversies between housing providers and tenants;
To protect the existing supply of rental housing from conversion to other uses; and
To prevent the erosion of moderately priced rental housing while providing housing providers and developers with a reasonable rate of return on their investments.
